args.type: {:conn_str? => String, :adapter => String, :database? => String, :encoding? => String, :user? => String, :password? => String, :host? => String, :port? => String, :convert_infinite_timestamps? => Or[string, nil, float], :connect_timeout? => Integer, :driver_options? => Hash, :notice_receiver? => Proc, :sslmode? => Or[disable, allow, prefer, require, verify-ca, verify-full...], :sslrootcert? => String, :search_path? => String, :use_iso_date_format? => Bool, :max_connections? => Integer}
